December 13, 2005

Blogging in Style: Ordered List

I'm going to be working on re-theming this blog shortly so I'm looking for some good inspiration. If I find anything I like I'll be sure to share it with you along with my two cents. So with that here's my first go: Ordered List This is the blog of Steve Smith who created the awesome WP-Tiger-Admin plugin. His old blog was pretty slick but this new redesign really sets his apart. I like the large font and simplistic layout; it makes the site very easy and enjoyable to read. I totally dig it.

DontTrustThisGuy.com is authored by Jim Jeffers, a twenty-something web consultant currently residing in Phoenix, AZ. You will find random ramblings, discussions on web technologies, user interface design, programming, business, politics, and anything else that crosses his mind here.

All content and images © 2005-2012 Jim Jeffers.
